description:
Locke & Quinn — Full-Service Family Law And Personal Injury Law Firm Serving The Legal Needs Of Richmond And Surrounding Areas

The attorneys of the Locke & Quinn law firm, in Richmond, Virginia, offer experienced legal counsel for clients needing assistance in the areas of divorce and family law, personal injury and estate planning.

Focused On Personalized Solutions

You will work directly with your attorney throughout your case and enjoy the benefit of the law firm's team approach to pursuing unique strategies and solutions to complex problems. You are sure to find the lawyers and staff friendly, confident and compassionate, as they take the time to listen and understand your concerns about seeking an immediate and long-term resolution. Building a strong attorney-client relationship is an important key to success. At Locke & Quinn, you will be educated about the legal process, informed about your options and involved in the strategy for a successful outcome.

Award-Winning Family Law And Personal Injury Litigation Attorneys

Locke & Quinn attorneys have received the highest AV Preeminent* peer review rating for ethical standards and legal ability. Richmond Magazine has listed them in their SuperLawyers segment and Virginia Business Magazine has voted them among the region's Legal Elite. Paralegals and staff are proud to provide the highest levels of client service in support of the firm's success and reputation for excellence.

Hours for consultation at their Richmond office are Monday through Thursday 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. and Friday 8:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. The firm accepts Visa, MasterCard and American Express.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
